name: Memerging
description:
I'm so sorry that this game is only in Chinese version.

How to play: Use the mouse to drag and drop the dialog box to change the dialogue of the NPC, thus completing the story on the tombstone on the right

It is the nature of most tricks to make the other person think what you want them to think, to package what you have instilled in them as what they believe themselves.

From this, we get the core mechanism of Word Surge - the 'stealing' of the other person's words with your own and using the replacement phrases for more dialogue.

However, there are always limits to trickery, and there are always things that cannot be tricked, such as 'death' itself.

In Word Surge, you will take on the role of an intelligent being wandering the post-apocalyptic wasteland, collecting the utterances of the souls that hover on the edge of the metaphysical world and the present learning their stories.

In this game, you will experience swirling textual logic, a surreal style of art, and a majestic soundtrack that blends industrial undertones with Gregorian arias.

游戏介绍

《字涌》

让对方以为你希望以为的，把你灌输的包装成对方自己想到的，这是绝大多数诡计的本质。

从这一点出发，我们得到了《字涌》的核心机制——用自己的话语“窃取”对方的话语，并用替换所得的语句进行更多的对话。

然而，诡计总有其限度，总有一些事物无法被欺骗，比如“死亡”本身。

在《字涌》中，你将扮演末世废土上游荡的智能体，在形而上界和现世的边缘，收集那些盘桓未去灵魂的语句，了解他们的故事。

在本游戏中，你将体验到旋回往复的文本逻辑、超现实风格的美术，以及融合工业底噪和格里高利咏叹调的磅礴配乐。

总之，谢谢大家玩我们的游戏。
